description: Potential data breach due to outdated security protocols in online assessment platform
mitigation: Security audit scheduled for January 2026, immediate patching of critical vulnerabilities underway

description: Assessment delivery delays due to legacy IT infrastructure limitations
mitigation: Infrastructure modernization project initiated, temporary capacity expansion in place

description: Insufficient marking capacity for peak assessment period across multiple qualifications
mitigation: Additional 45 markers recruited and training completed. Contingency plan established with partner organizations.

description: Quality assurance processes not consistently meeting regulatory standards across all centres
mitigation: New QA framework implementation underway. Enhanced centre monitoring and support programme launched.

description: Centre compliance monitoring gaps identified in remote assessment locations
mitigation: Enhanced remote monitoring procedures being rolled out. Investment in monitoring technology approved.

description: Results processing system vulnerability discovered during routine security review
mitigation: System patch applied successfully. No evidence of exploitation. Enhanced monitoring in place.

description: Malpractice detection system showing reduced effectiveness with new AI-assisted cheating methods
mitigation: AI-enhanced detection tools under evaluation. Partnership with technology providers to develop countermeasures.
